The 117 Infantry Battalion (Territorial Army), The Guards, Tiruchi, will conduct a recruitment rally for the posts of Soldier (general duty, tailor and hair dresser) from February 23 to 27. The rally will be held at the Army Training area at Khajamalai near Mannarpuram. Applicants should be in the age group 18 to 42 years. They would have to undergo a physical fitness test and medical checks. Candidates must be resident of Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat, Maharashtra, Rajasthan, Goa and the Union Territories of Puducherry, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Daman and Diu and Lakshadweep.

Camp to make changes in ration cards

A special camp to make changes in ration cards for residents in Lalgudi taluk will be held at the Government Boys Higher Secondary School in Lalgudi on Saturday. Residents of the taluk can apply for inclusion of names, deletions, corrections in names and changes in addresses in the ration cards during the camp to be held from 8.30 a.m. All petitions relating to ration cards would be redressed at the camp. Petitioners are required to come with relevant supporting documents and arrangements have been made for writing petitions on behalf of the applicants, a release said.

Special AMMA camps

Special camps under the Assured Maximum Service to Marginalised People in All Villages (AMMA) Scheme will be held at the following places in the district on Friday: K.Sathanur (South), K.Abishekapuram, Vazhavanthankottai, Pazhur,Muthureddiyapatti, Uthukuli,Theranipalayam, Bikshandarkovil, Thiruthiyamalai, Maruvathur and Kamalapuram. Residents of the villages can avail the services of the Revenue Department at the camp, Collector K.S.Palanisamy said in a press release.
title: Recruitment rally
